p: Covid-19 disease is an emergency and, as such, is unforeseen. In addition, the infection is new and therefore in many ways found us unprepared. The Chinese experience first, the Italian one then, but also what is happening in the various parts of the world, are the basis on which scientific knowledge is being generated. However, the differences in terms of context, health organization, measures taken to contain the viral spread, socio-cultural aspects, do not make it easy to transfer the best practices implemented by the countries initially affected to those most recently involved.
